message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DS 

Reasoning: 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes a multi-task stock prediction model that utilizes the Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) neural network model to predict the stock fluctuation trends. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval): The paper integrates multi-sourced data, including financial Web news and investors' sentiments extracted from the social network, to improve the prediction accuracy. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes an improved sub-mode coordinate algorithm (SMC) based on the stock similarity to reduce the variance of their subspace in each dimension produced by the tensor decomposition. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks): The paper utilizes investors' sentiments extracted from the social network as one of the multi-sourced data to improve the prediction accuracy. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper proposes a tensor-based approach to integrate multi-sourced data and an improved sub-mode coordinate algorithm to improve the quality of the input features.
